summary: A Flax-based implementation of the BEiT (Bidirectional Encoder representation from Image Transformers) model tailored for image classification tasks, encapsulating model architecture, parameter handling, and inference capabilities.
business_intent: Provide a ready-to-use, high-performance vision transformer model for developers and researchers to integrate BEiT image classification into JAX/Flax pipelines, accelerating AI product development and research workflows.
